description: Detects direct access to raw pastes in different paste services often used by malware in their second stages to download malicious code in encrypted or encoded form
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: User activity (e.g. developer that shared and copied code snippets and used the raw link instead of just copy & paste)
name: Raw Paste Service Access
query: url.original:(*.paste.ee\/r\/* OR *.pastebin.com\/raw\/* OR *.hastebin.com\/raw\/* OR *.ghostbin.co\/paste\/\*\/raw\/* OR *pastetext.net\/* OR *pastebin.pl\/* OR *paste.ee\/*)
